mapper.select: select top #{currentNum} o.id, o.title o.attachment, o.content, o.auditStatus, o.createTime, o.createUserId, o.updateTime, o.updateUserId from (select row_number() over(order by updateTime desc) as rownumber, * from (select * from tb_proclamation) as oo ) as o where rownumber > #{rowNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_promotion( title, attachment, content, auditStatus, createTime, createUserId, updateTime, updateUserId) values ( #{title}, #{attachment}, #{content}, #{auditStatus}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId})
